'''''The Stellar Moments Vol. 2''''' is the second character [[soundtrack]] album for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 21 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, all original compositions for the following characters: [[Aloy]], [[Eula]], [[Hu Tao]], [[Kaedehara Kazuha]], [[Kamisato Ayaka]], [[Kujou Sara]], [[Raiden Shogun]], [[Rosaria]], [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]], [[Sayu]], [[Thoma]], [[Xiao]], [[Yanfei]], and [[Yoimiya]].

The album was first announced on December 26, 2021, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.4]]. The tracklist was announced on January 20 and the album was later released on January 26.<ref>Weixin: [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jv1kaW_ACnfBGQToCjtOMg {{zh|《原神》第二张角色主题}}OST《闪耀的群星2 The Stellar Moments Vol. 2》即将上线}}]</ref>

==Trivia==
* This is the first album to contain (several) tracks that Yu-Peng Chen did not compose.
** Dimeng Yuan ({{zh|苑迪萌}}) solely composed [[Marching of Xiezhi]], [[Drifter's Destiny]], [[Flow of Autumn Wind]], [[Shirasagi Princess]], [[Muji-Muji Chaos!]], [[Eternity in a Moment]], [[Blossoms of Summer Night]], and [[Will of Thunder]];
** Qian Ding ({{zh|丁谦}}) composed [[Good Hunting on a New Horizon]];
** Xin Zhao ({{zh|赵鑫}}) composed [[Devotion of the Keeper]].
